I am a general purpose chatbot. My capabilities are : 
 1. I can chat with you. Try asking me for jokes or riddles! 
 2. Ask me the date and time 
 3. I can google search for you. Use format google: your query 
 4. I can get the present weather for any city. Use format weather: city name 
 5. I can get you the top 10 trending news in India. Use keywords 'Latest News' 
 6. I can get you the top 10 trending songs globally. Type 'songs' 
 7. I can set a timer for you. Enter 'set a timer: minutes to timer' 
 8. I can get the present Covid stats for any country. Use 'covid 19: world' or 'covid 19: country name' 
 For suggestions to help me improve, send an email to ted.thedlbot.suggestions@gmail.com . Thank you!!

o what if I don't know what 'Armageddon' means? It's not the end of the world.

What word is spelled incorrectly in every single dictionary?.....Incorrectly

What has a thumb and four fingers but is not actually alive?.....Your Gloves!
What 5-letter word becomes shorter when you add two letters to it?.....Short
Why can't a bike stand on it's own?.....It is two-tired.

patterns: Give me some interesting historical events

responses: Here’s a historical fact: The Great Wall of China is over 13,000 miles long!
On this day in history, the first successful human flight took place in 1903 by the Wright brothers.
Did you know? The Pyramids of Giza have stood for over 4,500 years.
One famous historical figure is Leonardo da Vinci, known for his art and inventions during the Renaissance.
Significant milestones include the moon landing in 1969 and the fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989.
Here’s a fun fact: The first Olympic Games were held in ancient Greece in 776 BC.
The fall of Constantinople in 1453 marked the end of the Byzantine Empire.
The invention of the printing press by Johannes Gutenberg in the 15th century revolutionized the spread of knowledge.
The signing of the Magna Carta in 1215 is considered a pivotal moment in the development of constitutional law.
The discovery of America by Christopher Columbus in 1492 was a major historical event.
The Battle of Waterloo in 1815 marked the end of Napoleon Bonaparte’s rule.
The Wright brothers’ first flight in 1903 was a key milestone in aviation history.
The Industrial Revolution, starting in the late 18th century, transformed industries and societies worldwide.
The French Revolution, beginning in 1789, was a significant turning point in French and world history.
The Suez Canal, opened in 1869, was a major engineering achievement that connected the Mediterranean Sea with the Red Sea.
The Cold War era, spanning from the end of World War II to 1991, was marked by geopolitical tension between the Soviet Union and the United States.
The discovery of penicillin by Alexander Fleming in 1928 revolutionized medicine and the treatment of bacterial infections.
The fall of the Berlin Wall in 1989 symbolized the end of the Cold War and the reunification of East and West Germany.
The Apollo 11 moon landing in 1969 was a landmark event in space exploration.
